title: Software Engineer
description: Develops and maintains web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and backend technologies.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyzes data, builds predictive models, and communicates insights to stakeholders.

title: Product Manager
description: Leads product development, defines requirements, and ensures successful product launches.

title: UX Designer
description: Designs user interfaces and experiences that are intuitive, accessible, and visually appealing.

title: Preschool Teacher
description: Plans and implements educational activities for preschool children, manages classroom behavior, communicates with parents, and supports the development of young children. Experience with special needs and diverse backgrounds is valued.
